query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team uses 6+ disconnected tools (Google Analytics, Salesforce, social media platforms, ad platforms) requiring manual data compilation for weekly reports. Takes 8 hours/week to create performance reports. No automated anomaly detection—team misses sudden campaign performance drops or emerging trends. Executive team requests ad-hoc insights that take 2-3 days to compile.',
  aiApproach = 'Build unified AI-powered analytics dashboard (using Tableau/Power BI + custom AI layer) that automatically aggregates data from all marketing platforms, identifies trends and anomalies, and generates natural language insights. Includes predictive forecasting for campaign performance and automated weekly executive summaries. Requires API integrations with 6+ data sources and custom ML models for anomaly detection.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Manual reporting: Export data from 6 platforms → clean and merge in Excel → create charts → write summary → email to stakeholders. 8 hours/week.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'Automated insights: Dashboard auto-refreshes daily → AI flags anomalies and trends → generates natural language insights → stakeholders access real-time dashboard. 1 hour/week for review.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual data compilation, enables real-time decision making, proactively surfaces optimization opportunities',
  processOwner = 'VP of Marketing',
  affectedTeams = '["Marketing Analytics", "Digital Marketing", "Marketing Operations", "Executive Team"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce reporting time by 85% (from 8 hours/week to 1 hour/week) and improve campaign optimization speed by 50%',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 8 hours/week manual reporting, 2-3 day turnaround for ad-hoc insights',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 1 hour/week reporting time, same-day ad-hoc insights, identify 10+ optimization opportunities per month',
  measurementMethod = 'Time tracking for reporting activities, count of AI-generated insights acted upon, campaign performance improvements'
WHERE title = 'AI-Powered Marketing Analytics Dashboard';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team uses 6+ disconnected tools (Google Analytics, Salesforce, social media platforms, ad platforms) requiring manual data compilation for weekly reports.
